Text:
1) Unpack release
2) copy all the content of the iso's into a folder on your hdd
3) run phoenix 1.2
4) Instruments -> Update ContentDescriptionRecord -> Internet
5) Instruments -> SID Unpacker
6) Scan a SIM File -> Locate the Folder where you extracted the files
7) Select both entries in the bottom field and hit unpack
8) Choose directory and extract
9) Run the exe
10)enjoy

thanX to rucka315
